QuestData.Title: Right Bot for the Job
QuestData.Description:
We don't waste anything around here. Every defeated bot gets a second chance!
If I'm going to fix this mechaspider, I'm going to need a few extra wrenchbots working with me.
Use my Bot Re-Energizer on three dead Repeating Wrenchbots and bring them to me, and I'll put them to work.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring three Repeating Wrenchbots to Recycler Kerchunk

Objectives.Objective: Repeating Wrenchbots delivered to Recycler Kerchunk
Bot Re-Energizer obtained from Recycler Kerchunk
